title: Extra support classes for 4th and 6th semester
content: are there any consequences to skipping these extra classes they have organised for every Monday and Wednesday? My gpa currently is just under the qualifying range, and i donâ€™t think i need these classes.

comments.body: what extra classes can you elaborate ?and be spsecific
They asked us to come for extra classes conducted for ppl below 6.8 cgpa. These classes will be conducted by our peers itself
Ive added more, i dont rlly know too much yet
Didn't know such a thing existed
We haven't had anything like this. You guys are the first batch to have this. Ask your teachers/HOD for all the details.
Did they send you an email to tell you this? Also are you in the 4th or 6th semester?
They did. Also im in 4th semester
I'm in the same situation dude, was there any consequence for skipping those classes?
